title: Bugsplat twice in a row.
body:
So I was playing a custom with friends, everything was alright at first then I got bugsplat, then when I reconnected I got bugsplat literally 5 seconds after reconnecting. 

What is going on?

replies.body: Sometimes those bugsplats happen when the game encounters a missing file or some other type of crash that it just couldn't handle or figure out the cause of. Try running a repair through the client options and test it in a practice or custom match. If that doesn't seem to have helped at all check out the other steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).
